comments:
After refactor->extract superclass

I selected a method to extract and leave checked the first "use extracted class where possible" checkbox. 

Click Next and leave all checked, than again next and "an unexpected exception occurred while creating a change object. See the error log for details".

I tried to reproduce this bug with other sample classes, but i cannot reproduce it. I cannot post my original sources because they are very long and proprietary. Anyway I hope you can try to understand the problem reading the eclipse .log; If I can help in some other way, let me know:
